activityConfigurations.name: Order Error in cost calculation canceled (CSER)
Sales Order Item to be checked

meta.expressionLhs: CASE WHEN MONTH ( "AUFK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10 THEN YEAR ( "AUFK"."ERDAT" ) || '-' || MONTH ( "AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ELSE YEAR ( "AUFK"."ERDAT" ) || '-0' || MONTH ( "AUFK"."ERDAT" ) END AS "#{\"AUFK\".\"ERDAT\"}" FORMAT "%Y-%m"

components.message:
General Information

#{This Sheet provides a general overview about the most important KPIs and its development over time. }

KPI Definition

#{Total Cycle Time in Days: }
#{Time between Process Start and Process End in Days.}

#{Subprocess Cycle Time in Days: }
#{Time between two activities in Days. From which activity the calculated Cycle Time should start and at which it should end can be configured through range specifiers.}

#{Automation Rate: }
#{Share of Activities completed automatically (by a batch system user).}

#{Undesired Activity Rate: }
#{Share of Purchase Order Items, in which at least one Undesired Activity (user defined) has happened.}

#{Repeated Activity Rate: }
#{Share of Purchase Order Items in which Activities (user defined) have happened more than once.}

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END

variables.name: activities_used_in_automation_rate
variables.value: 'Create Purchase Requisition Item','Change Price','Create Purchase Order Item','Receive Order Confirmation','Record Invoice Receipt','Record Goods Receipt','Delete Purchase Order Item','Release Purchase Order','Refuse Purchase Order','Cancel Invoice Receipt','Change Quantity','Cancel Goods Receipt','Block Purchase Order Item','Send Overdue Notice','Reactivate Purchase Order Item','Dun Order Confirmation'

variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT") IN (10,11,12) THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q1'
WHEN MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT") IN (1,2,3) THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q2'
WHEN MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT") IN (4,5,6) THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) || ' - Q3'
WHEN MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT") IN (7,8,9) THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q4'
ELSE NULL
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT") ||'-' || MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT")
ELSE YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT") ||'-0' || MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN CALENDAR_WEEK("AUFK"."ERDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT")
--- ADD one Year if we are already in CW 1 at the end of December
+ CASE WHEN MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT") = 12 AND CALENDAR_WEEK("AUFK"."ERDAT") = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
|| '-CW-' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("AUFK"."ERDAT")
ELSE YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT") || '-CW-0' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("AUFK"."ERDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH( "AUFK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN CASE
WHEN DAY("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("AUFK"."ERDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("AUFK"."ERDAT" )
END
ELSE CASE
WHEN DAY("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("AUFK"."ERDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("AUFK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("AUFK"."ERDAT" )
END
END
